nodes.text: @cmelt2003 Alot of it IS structural. U must understand the history of Banks that red line and discriminate us from owning a home or SBL. Did you know that a 🧒🏿man with a degree who's never been to prison has as much chance at getting a job then a white guy who has a high school diploma
@Roger2dot0 Thank you. I have not seen this article before.
@Roger2dot0 That is a very unfortunate situation. Do you have a source for that stat?
@Roger2dot0 Might or do? It’s not the same thing. There are a lot or factors that go into something like this.

@cmelt2003 I don't decide to racially discriminate my way out of not qualifying  4 the bank to not provide me with a loan or not to charge me the same interest rate as the white family who I might have the same income and credit rating as
@Roger2dot0 That seems more like the result of individual decisions rather than an institutional issue.

https://t.co/SpSg2gTs25\nFor all you corporations and big money FatCats of Industry that want to take a knee and show your solidarity with black people here's something that you cannot just show solidarity for but actually do something about
